video.title: Lucifer
video.synopsis: Bored with being the Lord of Hell, the devil relocates to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and forms a connection with a homicide detective.

episodes.synopsis: After an old acquaintance meets a violent fate, the charming Lucifer vows revenge on the perpetrators and makes an unexpected alliance.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While feeling the heat to return to hell, Lucifer makes time to investigate how overeager paparazzi contributed to a young man's death.
episodes.title: Lucifer, Stay. Good Devil.

episodes.synopsis: A pro quarterback on the brink of superstardom wakes to a grisly discovery and calls on Lucifer to help prove his innocence.
episodes.title: The Would-Be Prince of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer attempts to seduce Chloe, but she's just not like the other ladies. Meanwhile, Amenadiel shares his concern with Maze about Lucifer.
episodes.title: Manly Whatnots

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer's treated to an inside look at the ugly side of fashion. Armed with new information, Amenadiel hatches a plan to get Lucifer back home.
episodes.title: Sweet Kicks

episodes.synopsis: When a personal possession is stolen, Lucifer sets out to track the culprit. Meanwhile, Dr. Linda makes a fateful decision.
episodes.title: Favorite Son

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer goes in search of his missing property and gets help from an unlikely source. Chloe asks Dan for help with the Palmetto case.
episodes.title: Wingman

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer celebrates his "rebirthday," then teams with Chloe and Dr. Linda to investigate the murder of a controversial therapist.
episodes.title: Et Tu, Doctor?

episodes.synopsis: Suspicious that drugs are coming through a youth center, a priest asks Lucifer for a little help. Amenadiel and Malcolm have a heart-to-heart.
episodes.title: A Priest Walks into a Bar

episodes.synopsis: When a popular chef is poisoned, Chloe and Lucifer home in on a suspect. Lucifer learns that Chloe's family may be even crazier than his own.
episodes.title: Pops

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer makes an odd discovery: He loves doing charitable work. Dan tries to issue a warning. Chloe hunts a philanthropist's murderer.
episodes.title: St. Lucifer

episodes.synopsis: A murdered woman's body is twisted to resemble a pentagram, leading Chloe and an increasingly disturbed Lucifer into a seedy underworld.
episodes.title: #TeamLucifer

episodes.synopsis: Framed for murder, Lucifer works with Chloe to clear his name. Amenadiel does battle with a deadly foe. Lucifer asks for a favor.
episodes.title: Take Me Back to Hell

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the murder of a stand-in actress, Chloe attempts to solve the mystery of Lucifer's origin once and for all.
episodes.title: Everything's Coming Up Lucifer

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer suspects his newly arrived mother may behind a vicious crime. Later, Lucifer learns a bit about his hellish history.
episodes.title: Liar, Liar, Slutty Dress on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer joins Chloe and Dan to investigate a murder tied to an online video site and later makes a decision about his mother's punishment.
episodes.title: Sin-Eater

episodes.synopsis: A strange stamp points Chloe toward a possible murderer. Tempers flare during girls' night out. Amenadiel worries that his powers are fading.
episodes.title: Lady Parts

episodes.synopsis: Back to work after her car crash, Chloe investigates the murder of a famous action star. Lucifer's brother Uriel delivers a message from below.
episodes.title: The Weaponizer

episodes.synopsis: A zombie-themed wedding turns deadly. Maze takes Trixie out trick-or-treating. Lucifer has a revealing conversation with Dr. Linda.
episodes.title: Monster

episodes.synopsis: Chloe learns that the man convicted of killing her father is set to be temporarily released from prison. Maze searches for her true calling.
episodes.title: My Little Monkey

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is stabbed, Chloe and Lucifer look into a cultlike yoga group. Meanwhile, Dr. Linda reconnects with her favorite patient.
episodes.title: Trip to Stabby Town

episodes.synopsis: While Chloe, Dan and Lucifer take on the murder of a real estate titan, Charlotte hatches a plan to compel Lucifer to leave Earth.
episodes.title: Homewrecker

episodes.synopsis: Amenadiel tries to talk some sense into his mother. Chloe receives distressing news about a case. Lucifer takes the witness stand.
episodes.title: Quid Pro Ho

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer learns he's the only obvious connection between two murder victims. Dr. Linda dishes some advice to Maze. Chloe makes a move.
episodes.title: Stewardess Interruptus

episodes.synopsis: A college student's death leads Lucifer and Chloe down a poisonous path. Meanwhile, the pair tries to deal with their evolving relationship.
episodes.title: Love Handles

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer vows to go the extra mile to find the antidote needed to save Chloe's life. Later, Lucifer and his mother have it out.
episodes.title: A Good Day to Die

episodes.synopsis: After two weeks away, Lucifer returns to Los Angeles, but he's not alone. Later, Chloe shows off her acting skills.
episodes.title: Candy Morningstar

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer learns what he must do in order to reignite Azrael's blade. Chloe and Dan investigate the death of an elementary school administrator.
episodes.title: Deceptive Little Parasite

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer goes undercover at a mental institution to track down a killer but ends up meeting a man whose powers may rival his own.
episodes.title: God Johnson

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Linda's ethics are questioned. Lucifer catches an earful and makes a painful discovery. Amenadiel and Dan find they have something in common.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Goddess

episodes.synopsis: Amenadiel takes a stand. Lucifer's mother shares a secret. Dr. Linda improvises. Lucifer considers opening up to Chloe.
episodes.title: The Good, The Bad and The Crispy

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer tries to make sense of his new accessories. Meanwhile, newcomer Lieutenant Marcus Pierce gets off to a rocky start with his coworkers.
episodes.title: They're Back, Aren't They?

episodes.synopsis: As Lucifer and Chloe investigate a new case, Pierce's past comes into focus. Linda worries that her favorite patient isn't caring for himself.
episodes.title: The One with the Baby Carrot

episodes.synopsis: After Maze leaves for a change of scenery, Chloe worries that a scheming stranger may have something sinister planned.
episodes.title: Mr. and Mrs. Mazikeen Smith

episodes.synopsis: While Chloe tries to decipher Pierce's feelings, she and Lucifer investigate the murder of a youth counselor at an expensive reform program.
episodes.title: What Would Lucifer Do?

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a food chemist's death, Lucifer and Chloe cross paths with a blast from their past -- defense attorney Charlotte Richards.
episodes.title: Welcome Back, Charlotte Richards

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer and Ella head to Sin City to investigate the disappearance of an old friend. Meanwhile, Chloe and Linda let their hair down back home.
episodes.title: Vegas with Some Radish

episodes.synopsis: When a curious journalist takes a sudden interest in Lucifer's life, Maze wonders if there may be ulterior motives at play.
episodes.title: Off the Record

episodes.synopsis: Chloe goes undercover to investigate a murder tied to a celebrity dating app, while Lucifer serves as her wingman from afar.
episodes.title: Chloe Does Lucifer

episodes.synopsis: After Lucifer realizes the recipients of his favors are dying off, his ensuing investigation brings him face-to-face with the Sinnerman.
episodes.title: The Sinnerman

episodes.synopsis: The Sinnerman continues to vex Lucifer, as another life hangs in the balance. Meanwhile, Trixie crosses paths with Charlotte.
episodes.title: The Sin Bin

episodes.synopsis: In this flashback episode, Lucifer helps Amenadiel deal with L.A.'s eccentricities while Chloe and Dan investigate the murder of an MMA fighter.
episodes.title: City of Angels?

episodes.synopsis: After learning of Pierce's identity and predicament, Lucifer offers to help him make a deal. Meanwhile, Amenadiel attends to a personal issue.
episodes.title: All About Her

episodes.synopsis: While Lucifer and Pierce go undercover to track down a drug-connected killer, Maze deals with new feelings toward an old foe.
episodes.title: 'Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the death of a diamond thief, Chloe and Lucifer hone in an unexpected suspect. Meanwhile, Charlotte upsets Linda with a request.
episodes.title: My Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: A novelist whose characters are based on people from her past is murdered. Lucifer searches for suspects at the victim's high school reunion.
episodes.title: High School Poppycock

episodes.synopsis: A murder case exposes Chloe to Tinsel Town's seedy underbelly. Lucifer's plans to help Cain go sideways when Amenadiel and Maze join the fun.
episodes.title: Infernal Guinea Pig

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer and Chloe put themselves in the line of fire while protecting a superstar singer. Meanwhile, Charlotte plays peacemaker.
episodes.title: Let Pinhead Sing!

episodes.synopsis: While Chloe and Lucifer investigate a killer who pursues couples in love, Pierce suspects the case may be connected to his past.
episodes.title: The Last Heartbreak

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a murder with a familiar suspect. Meanwhile, Maze looks to make a change and Charlotte discovers something big.
episodes.title: Orange Is the New Maze

episodes.synopsis: A murder witness's vivid description of the guardian that saved her life gives Lucifer pause. Chloe's relationship with Pierce takes a turn.
episodes.title: The Angel of San Bernardino

episodes.synopsis: Following a prima ballerina's murder, Lucifer helps Chloe search for the suspect while trying to keep her from thinking about Pierce.
episodes.title: Anything Pierce Can Do I Can Do Better

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer and Dan investigate a murder with a dog show connection. Chloe and her pals celebrate her big decision, but second thoughts are hard to shake.
episodes.title: All Hands on Decker

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a woman's death, Lucifer and Chloe come to a distressing realization. Also, a phone call leaves Lucifer reeling.
episodes.title: Quintessential Deckerstar

episodes.synopsis: Following a shocking loss, Lucifer and Chloe search for the responsible party. Maze works to repair an old friendship.
episodes.title: A Devil of My Word

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer investigates the murder of a child psychiatrist. Meanwhile, Ella ponders a childhood secret she's been keeping.
episodes.title: Boo Normal

episodes.synopsis: In an alternate dimension, Lucifer gets to experience what his life would have been like had he never met Chloe.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a beekeeper's murder with Lucifer, Chloe insists that she's completely fine with his devilish revelation, thank you very much.
episodes.title: Everything's Okay

episodes.synopsis: Chloe and Lucifer look into a murder on the set of a reality show. Father Kinley presses forward with a plan. Amenadiel reconsiders his idea of home.
episodes.title: Somebody’s Been Reading Dante’s Inferno

episodes.synopsis: An ex-gang member's murder may mask an even darker crime. Lucifer catches Chloe in a lie. Dan and Maze go rogue. Linda braces for looming motherhood.
episodes.title: O, Ye of Little Faith, Father

episodes.synopsis: When a jewelry designer is murdered, Lucifer and Chloe strive to solve the case without each other's help. Also, Lucifer reconnects with an old flame.
episodes.title: All About Eve

episodes.synopsis: After a collector of classic cars is killed, Lucifer and Chloe search for the culprit -- as well as some closure to their relationship.
episodes.title: Expire Erect

episodes.synopsis: While Lucifer and Chloe search for a connection between a murdered auditor and a nudist colony, Amenadiel plays host to an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Orgy Pants to Work

episodes.synopsis: Eve takes a more active role in her main man's professional life. Meanwhile, Lucifer gets back to basics and Amenadiel fights for his family.
episodes.title: Devil Is as Devil Does

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a teacher's murder. Meanwhile, Lucifer goes to extremes to convince Eve to dump him, and Amenadiel mentors a teen.
episodes.title: Super Bad Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer's so-called epiphany has Chloe worried, but it's his physical transformation that's really freaking her out. Also, Maze gives Eve a pep talk.
episodes.title: Save Lucifer

episodes.synopsis: With murderous demons on the loose in Los Angeles, it's up to Lucifer to reign in the chaos and protect the people he most cares about.
episodes.title: Who's da New King of Hell?

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer toys with a murder victim while Chloe and Maze investigate the death. Meanwhile, Amenadiel cleans up the club, and Linda mothers a genius.
episodes.title: Really Sad Devil Guy

episodes.synopsis: After spending an eternity in hell, Lucifer returns to the land of the living — but there's something a little different about this handsome devil.
episodes.title: Lucifer! Lucifer! Lucifer!

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer — the real one this time — helps Chloe investigate a murder committed on the set of a TV show inspired by his own life.
episodes.title: ¡Diablo!

episodes.synopsis: The year is 1946. The world is black and white. And Lucifer is the star of his own noir detective story featuring familiar characters in new roles.
episodes.title: It Never Ends Well for the Chicken

episodes.synopsis: Amenadiel helps Chloe investigate a nun's untimely demise. Meanwhile, Lucifer lends Dan a hand, and Linda reveals a painful part of her history.
episodes.title: Detective Amenadiel

episodes.synopsis: After a popular DJ is electrocuted on stage, Chloe searches for the killer while Lucifer tries to keep his jealousy over an ex-flame in check.
episodes.title: BlueBallz

episodes.synopsis: As a shocking side effect of his romance with Chloe throws Lucifer for a loop, the new couple pursues a murderer with a most unusual M.O.
episodes.title: Our Mojo

episodes.synopsis: Chloe learns a serial killer may have embellished his crimes. Amenadiel worries about his son's health. Pete opens up to Ella.
episodes.title: Spoiler Alert

episodes.synopsis: Chloe and Ella investigate a mini-golf murder. Lucifer, Michael, Amenadiel and Linda prepare for the holiest of family dinners.
episodes.title: Family Dinner

episodes.synopsis: It's a musical? Yep, it's a musical. Lucifer, Chloe and the gang sing and dance to a slew of popular tunes while investigating a referee's murder.
episodes.title: Bloody Celestial Karaoke Jam

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer's father — you know, God — decides to experience life as a regular human. Meanwhile, a boxer dies under mysterious circumstances.
episodes.title: Resting Devil Face

episodes.synopsis: A straightforward prisoner transport job turns into an increasingly dangerous, yet oddly invigorating, odyssey for Dan.
episodes.title: Daniel Espinoza: Naked and Afraid

episodes.synopsis: Linda throws herself into a deeply personal mission. Maze unmasks a blast from the past. Amenadiel ponders a new job.
episodes.title: A Little Harmless Stalking

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer angles to be his father's successor. Ella makes a painful confession. Chloe investigates a murder at an aquarium.
episodes.title: Nothing Lasts Forever

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer learns that not all of his siblings want him to land the big promotion. Also, Dan offers to set Ella up with an old friend.
episodes.title: Is This Really How It's Going to End?!

episodes.synopsis: The end is nigh! Lucifer, Chloe, Maze and Amenadiel prepare for battle with Michael and his not-so-angelic army of supporters.
episodes.title: A Chance at a Happy Ending

episodes.synopsis: Before Lucifer starts his new job, he and Chloe experience a magical night with a murderous end. Linda and Amenadiel host Maze and Eve for dinner.
episodes.title: Nothing Ever Changes Around Here

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to be helpful, Lucifer assists an exasperated Carol investigate a drag queen's death. Ella and Chloe look into Carol’s mysterious background.
episodes.title: Buckets of Baggage

episodes.synopsis: Loony Lucifer and cartoon Chloe find themselves trapped in an animated loop. Amenadiel prepares for his new job. Dan returns to the city of angels.
episodes.title: Yabba Dabba Do Me

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer reconnects with a few former flames in hopes of disproving Rory's claim. Dan tries to find someone — anyone — who can actually see him.
episodes.title: Pin the Tail on the Daddy

episodes.synopsis: Not believing that he could have abandoned his future daughter, Lucifer sets out to prove an alternate theory: He must have been murdered.
episodes.title: The Murder of Lucifer Morningstar

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to do well on his first day with the LAPD, Amenadiel crosses paths with a racist detective from his past. Also, Lucifer tries to bond with Rory.
episodes.title: A Lot Dirtier Than That

episodes.synopsis: Just as Eve and Maze's wedding day arrives, Eve's ex, Adam — yes, that Adam — shows up hoping to reconcile. Later, Ella delivers some distressing news.
episodes.title: My Best Fiend's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer says he's finally ready to be God, but his non-functioning wings would tend to disagree. Linda reluctantly shares the first draft of her book.
episodes.title: Save the Devil, Save the World

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer tries to enjoy what may be his last day on Earth, Dan's killer escapes from prison, and Chloe drops a serious bombshell.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Lucifer

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to rescue Rory, Lucifer and Chloe confront her kidnapper with guns and wings blazing. Lucifer finally comes to terms with his purpose.
episodes.title: Partners 'Til the End
